entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
